description.name: Dashflo Reseller
description.tagline: Effortlessly resell Dashflo hosting services to your customers.
description.long: Dashflo Reseller allows you to offer hosting services to your customers without having to worry about managing the backend servers, scaling with demand, worrying about security/DDoS attacks, and having to develop new features. It allows you to focus on marketing, sales and support while Dashflo takes care of the rest for you.
features: Pay only for the resoures you allocate
